game.title: Dragon's Last Breath
game.description: Fear has gripped the land as a mighty dragon from the north has descended upon us. Your task is to rid us of the beast and bring peace to our kingdom. Remember, the beast is not to be underestimated!
game.reward: 10,000 gold and the Sword of Azeroth

task.objective: Gather the necessary materials for your journey
task.description: Before you square off against the dragon, gather the necessary provisions and materials. Be sure you are ready to face the beast.
The dragon has its minions guarding the path to its lair. You need to fight and defeat them to proceed further in your quest.
After defeating the minions, your final task awaits – facing off against the mighty dragon. Stay strong and defeat it to bring peace to our kingdom.
